member.name: T:Windows.UI.WebUI.Core.WebUICommandBar
member.summary: Represents a command bar.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.WebUI.Core.WebUICommandBar.BackgroundColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the background color of the command bar.
member.returns: The background color of the command bar.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.WebUI.Core.WebUICommandBar.ClosedDisplayMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the closed display mode for the command bar.
member.returns: The closed display mode for the command bar.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.WebUI.Core.WebUICommandBar.ForegroundColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the foreground color of the command bar.
member.returns: The foreground color of the command bar.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.WebUI.Core.WebUICommandBar.IsOpen
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the command bar is open.
member.returns: true if the command bar is open; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.WebUI.Core.WebUICommandBar.Opacity
member.summary: Gets or sets the opacity level of the command bar.
member.returns: The opacity level of the command bar.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.WebUI.Core.WebUICommandBar.PrimaryCommands
member.summary: Gets the primary commands on the command bar.
member.returns: The primary commands on the command bar.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.WebUI.Core.WebUICommandBar.SecondaryCommands
member.summary: Gets the secondary commands on the command bar.
member.returns: The secondary commands on the command bar.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.WebUI.Core.WebUICommandBar.Size
member.summary: Gets the size of the command bar.
member.returns: The size of the command bar.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.WebUI.Core.WebUICommandBar.Visible
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the command bar is displayed.
member.returns: true if the command bar is visible; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Occurs when a menu is closed.

member.summary: Occurs when the size of the command bar changes.

member.name: M:Windows.UI.WebUI.Core.WebUICommandBar.GetForCurrentView
member.summary: Gets the command bar currently being presented.
member.returns: The command bar.
